origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'BINGNews.get_latest_articles', 'description': 'Get the latest news articles based on a search query', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the search query'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'the list of latest news articles'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解投资银行的并购活动。首先，从最新的金融新闻中获取5篇关于投资银行并购的文章。然后，获取摩根大通过去三年的并购历史数据。接着，分析这些数据以确定其并购趋势。最后，通过公司名称获取摩根大通的股票代码，并提供一些并购策略。
获取最新的关于投资银行并购的金融新闻文章
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

{'articles': [{'title': 'JPMorgan Chase Completes Acquisition of XYZ Bank', 'date': '2023-10-01', 'summary': 'JPMorgan Chase has completed the acquisition of XYZ Bank, expanding its market presence.'}, {'title': 'Goldman Sachs Announces Merger with ABC Financial', 'date': '2023-09-28', 'summary': 'Goldman Sachs has announced a merger with ABC Financial, aiming to enhance its services.'}, {'title': 'Morgan Stanley to Merge with DEF Investments', 'date': '2023-09-25', 'summary': 'Morgan Stanley is set to merge with DEF Investments, strengthening its position in the market.'}, {'title': 'Bank of America Acquires GHI Corp', 'date': '2023-09-20', 'summary': 'Bank of America has acquired GHI Corp, expanding its portfolio.'}, {'title': 'Citigroup Merges with JKL Group', 'date': '2023-09-18', 'summary': 'Citigroup has merged with JKL Group, enhancing its global reach.'}]}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'articles': [{'title': 'JPMorgan Chase Completes Acquisition of XYZ Bank', 'date': '2023-10-01', 'summary': 'JPMorgan Chase has completed the acquisition of XYZ Bank, expanding its market presence.'}, {'title': 'Goldman Sachs Announces Merger with ABC Financial', 'date': '2023-09-28', 'summary': 'Goldman Sachs has announced a merger with ABC Financial, aiming to enhance its services.'}, {'title': 'Morgan Stanley to Merge with DEF Investments', 'date': '2023-09-25', 'summary': 'Morgan Stanley is set to merge with DEF Investments, strengthening its position in the market.'}, {'title': 'Bank of America Acquires GHI Corp', 'date': '2023-09-20', 'summary': 'Bank of America has acquired GHI Corp, expanding its portfolio.'}, {'title': 'Citigroup Merges with JKL Group', 'date': '2023-09-18', 'summary': 'Citigroup has merged with JKL Group, enhancing its global reach.'}]}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
